name: Fable Anniversary
notes: Game might start minimized, click the Fable icon on your task bar to bring up the game window or run the game in a virtual desktop.
content:
files:
- x360ce_dinput8: https://lutris.net/files/tools/x360ce-dinput8.tar.gz
game:
  appid: 288470
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Binaries/Win32
    file: x360ce_dinput8
- task:
    app: vcrun2010
    description: Installing Visual C++ 2010 Runtime
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    app: dotnet40
    description: Installing .NET 4.0
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
winesteam:
  StrictDrawOrdering: enabled
  overrides:
    dinput8: native,builtin
    xinput1_3: builtin
  xinput: true
